00523 
00535                 static void threadUpdate()
00536                 {
00537                         while(!mShuttingDown)
00538                         {
00539                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton()._processQueuedSounds();
00540                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton()._updateBuffers();
00541 #if OGGSOUND_THREADED
00542 #       ifndef LINUX
00543                                 Sleep(2);
00544 #       else
00545                                 sleep(2);
00546 #       endif
00547 #endif
00548                                 mUpdateThread->yield();
00549                         }
00550                 }
00551 
00552 #endif
